data.title: Ghost Sonata and When We Dead Awaken (Crofts Classics)
meta_keywords: Books by August Strindberg Ghost Sonata and When We Dead Awaken (Crofts Classics) 9780882951126 Harlan Davidson  V9780882951126
data.meta_description: Books by August Strindberg Ghost Sonata and When We Dead Awaken (Crofts Classics) 9780882951126 Harlan Davidson  V9780882951126
data.text: Together in this volume are two plays by the Scandinavian geniuses of modern drama, which focus on a single themeâ€“the reality of death. Translated and edited by Thaddeus L. Torp, this edition contains both August Strindberg's Ghost Sonata and Henrik Ibsen's When We Dead Awaken for performance and study and includes an introduction, a chronology of principal works and important events in the authors' lives, and a bibliography.
